name: Breach Beam
description: You target a creature within a moderate (20 unit) distance and deal 10 aetheric damage to them if they fail a defense check of 8. Additionally, after dealing damage to a creature with this spell, that creature cannot benefit from half mitigation to your choice of electric, heat or cold damage until the end of their next turn.
charge: The spell becomes a line with a width of 1 unit, affecting anyone within the area.
